about_the_game:
The spirits that uphold the foundation of the world.
An anomaly occurred among those spirits.
And chaos befell the world...

Young spirit mage Alto suddenly lost the ability to communicate with the spirits
"The spirits are acting strange."
What is happening to the spirits?
In order to calm the disturbed spirits, Alto decided to set out on a journey to seal them.

A serverless, asynchronous, and multiplayer rogue-like game.
By sharing the main player's dungeon ID (a string) through chat or other means, anyone can play that dungeon and support the main player.
Support players can reveal hidden passages visible only to them, send item codes (strings) to provide missing items to the main player,
and when the main player opens a door, they can convey the unlock code (a string) to the support player to open that door.
This creates a loosely interactive exchange between the two parties.
Wouldn't it be fun to easily support your favorite streamer in this way?

Another key point is item management.
Since almost all items have a limited number of uses, the choice of which items to use and which to save becomes crucial.
While it is necessary to use weapons that match the enemy's attributes to progress advantageously, but these items break quickly...

Features:

・Cooperation with other players: Share dungeon IDs through chat and receive support from other players. Get guidance on passageways only visible to support players, receive item supplies... and since there's no player number limit, it's perfect for live streaming!

・Item management-focused roguelike: Fill your limited item slots with strategically chosen weapons and armor. As items are easy to break, procure and choose items wisely while aiming to conquer the dungeon!

・Action-packed boss battles: In contrast to the roguelike journey, boss battles transform into action-packed sequences! However, don't worry. The roguelike system, where the world stops when you don't move, is still active here, allowing for relaxed item selection.

・Hero weakening with progress: Sealing a boss weakens weapons of that attribute! Choosing which attribute to conquer first is also an important decision!

・Permadeath: Since it's a roguelike, if you're defeated, start over from scratch! Be cautious as all levels and picked-up items are reset.

short_description: This game is a roguelike where item management is crucial. Since almost all items have a limited number of uses, the choice of whether to use or save each item becomes important. You can also cooperate with other users by sharing dungeon IDs!
